com.st.st25sdk.ndef

Class BtRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFRecord
      • com.st.st25sdk.ndef.BtRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BtRecord
extends NDEFRecord
    BtRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing Bluetooth NDEF records Those records are used to implement Bluetooth Secure Simple Pairing (SSP) using NFC SSP describes the notion of OOB (Out Of Band) pairing, which exchanges Bluetooth OOB data over the NFC channel. Reference document: NFCForum-AD-BluetoothSSP
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Constructor for BtRecord
        Parameters:
        deviceName - name of the Bluetooth device
        macAddr - Bluetooth Device MAC address of the device to pair (Little Endian)
        deviceClass - Class of the Bluetooth device
        uuidClass - Service class information used to identify services supported by the device
        uidClassList - Service Class list
